original_text: For before these days rose up Theudas, boasting himself to be somebody; to whom a number of men, about four hundred, joined themselves: who was slain; and all, as many as obeyed him, were scattered, and brought to nought.
korean_text: 이전에 드다가 일어나 스스로 선전하매 사람이 약 사백 명이나 따르더니 그가 죽임을 당하매 따르던 모든 사람들이 흩어져 없어졌고

sentences.original_text: For before these days rose up Theudas
to whom a number of men, about four hundred, joined themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 약 사백 명의 사람들이 그에게 합류하였으나

sentences.original_text: and all, as many as obeyed him
